  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    BCLHighlight
    A BCLHighlight object represents a location within a book that renders as highlighted.
    BCLLocation
    A BCLLocation object represents a location within a book.
    BCLNavigationElement
    A BCLNavigationElement object represents an element within an EPUB3 navigation document.
    BCLPackage
    A BCLPackage object represents a package within an EPUB container.
    BCLPageList  
    BCLPageListItem
    This simple object contains the page label, idref and cfi so it can be used to display the page number or navigate to it in the book.
    BCLReaderInitializer
    This class must be called to initialize the reader framework prior to other API calls.
    BCLReaderSettings  
    BCLReaderView
    Custom view that renders an ePub within a WebView.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    BCLReaderSettings.BCLReaderColumnMode  
    BCLReaderSettings.BCLReaderTheme
